title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 281.2 - Parties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 281.2 - Parties

State Regulations

The party commencing an appeal shall be known as the
appellant. Any adverse party shall be known as the respondent. After an appeal
is commenced in accordance with these rules, no party shall be joined or
permitted to intervene, except by leave or direction of the
commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
281.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
